document.full_text: house of representatives speaker john boehner on monday blasted democratic spending-cut proposals as "smoke and mirrors," undercutting the notion that progress is being made on a budget deal that would avert a government shutdown.
document.title: stumbling blocks remain in budget fight
lines_and_colors: house of representatives speaker john boehner on monday blasted democratic spending-cut proposals as "smoke and mirrors," undercutting the notion that progress is being made on a budget deal that would avert a government shutdown.
